scenario_text.value:
Takuma, me and Labramon are gonna go check
the shrine.

Okay, Aoi! Don’t forget to take some water
with you!
Huh?! Oh, sorry!

Don’t rush too much, Aoi, or you might get
careless.

I know, I know... I just can’t help getting
a little anxious.

It’s just that every minute, every second we
waste is gone forever...

(Usually I’d tell Aoi to stop worrying so
much.)
(But this time I know exactly how she feels.)

(If something happened to Kaito while we were
hanging around doing nothing...)

(Dammit, we need to calm ourselves down
somehow.)

(Imagining the worst will only lead to
mistakes. We’ve gotta get it together.)
(In order to relieve our anxiety, we should.)
Prepare ourselves.
Hurry up.
Stay rational for now.
Prepare ourselves.

We have to be prepared for anything and
everything, Aoi.

What?! But we can’t just abandon Kaito and
Dracumon!

That’s not what I meant! Look, just hear me
out.
Um, sure.
It sucks, but there’s only so much we can do.

Like, we can’t just wave a wand and see
everywhere on the island at once.

Right... All we can do is search for them to
the best of our ability.

So let’s do what we can as well as we can,
one thing at a time, and stay calm.

We need to prepare ourselves to work so hard
that we won’t regret anything.

It’s our only choice. Keeping that in mind
might calm us down a little.

I see what you mean. I definitely don’t want
to have any regrets.

We have to use every ounce of our energy to
make it back together.

So take some water with you. Let’s stay
focused and not panic, okay?
Got it. Let’s do this!
Hurry up.
Let’s hurry up and look for Kaito, Aoi.

You’re making me even more stressed saying
things like that, Takuma.

I can’t help it. The stress won’t go away
until we find him.
I guess you’re right...

Sorry, Labramon, but I tend to overlook
things when I get frantic.

So let me know if that happens. I’m counting
on you.

I guess there’s no helping it. I’ll do my
best.
Stay rational.
We need to stay rational, Aoi.

I wanna get this over with too, I really do.
But what if you got hurt?
I know... I have to be more careful.
All right then, I’m heading off!

The point is not to go rushing off like that!
You’re forgetting your water and stuff!
Oh! Sorry...
(Is she really taking this to heart?)

It’s just... What if something happens to
Kaito in the meantime? Ugh...
